meanings.definition: A device that generates electricity when mechanical stress is applied.
meanings.sent1: The piezo in my watch converts movement into power.
meanings.sent2: I used a piezo to power the small flashlight.
meanings.sent3: The piezo in the toy car made it move when I pressed it.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a piezo, lighting up the room with energy.
meanings.sent5: The piezo hummed softly as it converted pressure into electricity.
